table.name: vtiger_quickview
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_quickview` ( `fieldid` int(19) NOT NULL, `related_fieldid` int(19) NOT NULL, `sequence` int(19) NOT NULL, `currentview` int(19) NOT NULL, KEY `fk_1_vtiger_quickview` (`fieldid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_quickview` FOREIGN KEY (`fieldid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_field` (`fieldid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
